mapper.update:
update Login
name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
post = #{post,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
postid = #{postid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
py = #{py,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
pyname = #{pyname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
id_old = #{idOld,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BK1 = #{bk1,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
BK2 = #{bk2,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
BK3 = #{bk3,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
BK4 = #{bk4,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
BK5 = #{bk5,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}

update Login set name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, post = #{post,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, postid = #{postid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, py = #{py,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, pyname = #{pyname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, id_old = #{idOld,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BK1 = #{bk1,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, BK2 = #{bk2,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, BK3 = #{bk3,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, BK4 = #{bk4,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, BK5 = #{bk5,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}
mapper.select: select from login where id = #{id} and bk2 = #{pwd}
select a.id,a.name,a.ORGANIZATION_ID as "organizationId",b.NAME as "organizationName" from login a, ORGANIZATION b where a.ORGANIZATION_ID = b.ID and a.id = #{id}
